Name: Tile Rider
About the game: Guide your —Åar avatar through the world made of tiles. Uncover hidden paths, meet friends and outsmart enemies. Each level of the game is a unique tiny adventure. The player controls the car, which can be equipped with a weapon and a magnet gadget that can move objects. In most cases levels can be completed with smart logical solutions, but sometimes the player has to enter battles.
